165.title: Fleer Dubble Bubble
notes: Chewing gum often advertised by funny kid strips in comic books. The strip is sometimes formally called The Adventures of the Dubble Bubble Kids, but the more complete list in this index is here. The strip is sometimes signed "Ray T.", and this is Ray Thompson according to The Encyclopedia of American Comics , ed. by Ron Goulart (New York : Facts on File, 1990), p. 271.
